nxt

Class NXTConstants

  • java.lang.Object
    • nxt.NXTConstants

  • public final class NXTConstants
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for storing all the sensors, motors and constants defining the NXT hardware.
    Author:
    Andrei Purcarus
